patthana15.66:1.1_0: Pariyāpannaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naapariyāpanno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.66:1.1_1: Apariyāpannaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naapariyāpanno nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.66:2.1_0: Pariyāpannaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naapariyāpanno naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
